ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mvlladdi.1 | |- A e. CC |
| 2 |  | mvlladdi.2 | |- B e. CC |
| 3 |  | mvlladdi.3 | |- ( A + B ) = C |
| 4 | 2, 1 | #P_pncan3oi | |- ( ( B + A ) - A ) = B |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_addcomi | |- ( A + B ) = ( B + A ) |
| 6 | 5, 3 | #P_eqtr3i | |- ( B + A ) = C |
| 7 | 6 | #P_oveq1i | |- ( ( B + A ) - A ) = ( C - A ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_eqtr3i | |- B = ( C - A ) |
